analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x9693823c95cf2c02118469a06962a24449d00209.sol:
	Contract Nardo has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x9693823c95cf2c02118469a06962a24449d00209.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/19/0x9693823c95cf2c02118469a06962a24449d00209.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
